Description: Small shallow dish, hand-modelled in Nile silt clay, with no surface treatment.
Excavator/field collector: Excavated by: Dr David George Hogarth
Curator's comments: Such vessels occur frequently in New Kingdom domestic contexts, such as at Tell el-Amarna: P. Rose, The Eighteenth Dynasty Pottery Corpus from Amarna (MEES 83, London, 2007): 140, 286.
Exhibition history: Exhibited: 2002, St Albans, Life and Death
